trans-unit.source: Defines custom placement parameters for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacement> structure defines a location for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control with respect to its parent, and defines how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> moves to become more visible when it is obscured by a screen boundary.

A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback?displayProperty=fullName> delegate returns an array of these structures as custom placement options for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode.Custom>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacement"></xref> structure.

The <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> that is relative to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget"></xref> where the upper-left corner of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> is placed.

The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PopupPrimaryAxis"></xref> along which a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control moves when it is obstructed by a screen edge.
Compares this structure with another <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacement"></xref> structure to determine whether they are equal.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacement"></xref> structure to compare.
`true` if the structures have the same values; otherwise, `false`.
Gets the hash code for this structure.
The hash code for this structure.
Compares two <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacement"></xref> structures to determine whether they are equal.
The first <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacement"></xref> structure to compare.
The second <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacement"></xref> structure to compare.
`true` if the structures have the same values; otherwise, `false`.
Compares two <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacement"></xref> structures to determine whether they are not equal.
The first <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacement"></xref> structure to compare.
The second <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacement"></xref> structure to compare.
`true` if the structures do not have the same values; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets the point that is relative to the target object where the upper-left corner of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control is placedl.
The target object is the element that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> is relative to.
For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md).
A <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> that is used to position a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control.
The default value is (0,0).

Gets or sets the direction in which to move a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> is obscured by screen boundaries.

The direction in which to move a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> control when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup"></xref> is obscured by screen boundaries.
